price: Então, aqueles, cujos pesos em boas obras forem pesados, esses serão os bem-aventurados.
arabic: فَمَن ثَقُلَتۡ مَوَٰزِينُهُۥ فَأُوْلَٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلۡمُفۡلِحُونَ

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: faman thaqulat mawāzīnuhu fa-ulāika humu al-muf'liḥūna
